name: Apple
description: A sweet, crunchy fruit often red or green in color. Commonly eaten raw or in various dishes.

name: Banana
description: A soft, sweet fruit with a yellow peel and high potassium content. Popular energy source.

name: Orange
description: A juicy citrus fruit known for its bright orange color and high vitamin C content.

name: Strawberry
description: A small, red fruit with seeds on the outside. Sweet and juicy, often used in desserts.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a spiky, tough outer skin and sweet, tart yellow flesh.

name: Grape
description: Small, round or oval-shaped berries that grow in clusters. Can be green, red, purple, or black.

name: Mango
description: A sweet, tropical fruit with a large, flat pit. Known for its distinct flavor and vibrant color.

name: Watermelon
description: A large, green-skinned fruit with sweet, juicy red or pink flesh and black seeds. Very hydrating.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, round, dark blue or purple berries with a sweet-tart flavor, often eaten raw or in baked goods.

name: Kiwi
description: A small, oval fruit with fuzzy brown skin, bright green flesh, and tiny black seeds. Sweet and tangy.
